sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Norwegian: Krigen gråte for rettferdighet var over - mye til myndighetens chagrin.
backtrans: The war cry for justice was over - much to the authority's Chagrin.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Norwegian: Regimets beslutning adummerer den underliggende agendaen.
backtrans: The regime's decision also admits the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Norwegian: Samfunnet var engstelig over passering av de nødvendige reformene.
backtrans: The community was anxious over the passage of the necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Norwegian: Tenk-tanken publiserte et papir som beskriver deres unnskyldning av dødsstraff.
backtrans: Thinking tank published a paper that describes their apology of the death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Norwegian: Aught var igjen av petisjonens gyldighet
backtrans: Aught was left by the validity of the petition

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Norwegian: Presidenten formidlet sin ministre for å spenne opp som nøkkelopposisjonsstøtte for sin økonomiske plan var i ferd med å spenne.
backtrans: The president communicated its ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for its financial plan was about to buckle.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Norwegian: Velgerne var chuffed å se regningen passert.
backtrans: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
backtrans: The lawyer's discursive story fogged the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Norwegian: EU-blokken motsatte seg en eventuell pålegg av anti-dumping.
backtrans: The EU block opposed a possible imposition of anti-dumping.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Norwegian: En fulsom eulogy ble levert av det slående rådene.
backtrans: A fulistic eulogy was provided by the striking advice.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Norwegian: Gig-økonomi byrået bestemte seg for å garnere refusjonene!
backtrans: Gig economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Norwegian: Medlemmer av den anti-teokratiske revolusjonære bevegelsen omstyrt jevnaldrende i kraft!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrow peers in effect!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Norwegian: Traitors skuffende besluttet å kjempe med kolonialistene.
backtrans: Traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
